translations: n.律师帮办；律师的专职助手

phrs.translation: 律师助理, 律师专职助手, 法律助理, 法务专员
法务研究, 律师助理学, 律师辅助研究
律师助理, 法律助理

sentences.sentence: say that I know the law. I put a lot of effort into my education as a paralegal and take it seriously.
sentences.translation: 第三点就是他们会说我懂法律，我读律师助理时付出了很多努力，并且我非常认真地对待它。

sentences.sentence: An attorney and a paralegal in this office read every draft of every opinion in all cases prior to their release.
sentences.translation: 所有案例的每一项法律意见的每一草稿在公布前都要经我们办公室的一位律师和一位法律助理审读。

sentences.sentence: A: I have been working as a paralegal for the last 10 months through an agency that specializes in the legal field.
sentences.translation: 过去的十个月，我一直在一家法律专业代理处做律师专职助理。
